alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Pontotoc; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 7:08PM CDT until September 23 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Seminole County in east central Oklahoma... North central Pontotoc County in east central Oklahoma... West central Hughes County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Bowlegs, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Holdenville, Maud, Bowlegs, Francis, Sasakwa, and Spaulding. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
